actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to apply to persons eligible for contract health care the patient payment provisions which apply to members of the uniformed services on active duty and their dependents.

summary.text: Makes the patient payment provisions presently applicable to members of the uniformed services on active duty and their dependents applicable to all persons eligible for contract health care, including former members. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1086 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to apply to persons eligible for contract health care the patient payment provisions which apply to members of the uniformed services on active duty and their dependents.
